comment: Takes attendance randomly 10 times during year, grading system is impossible to understand - uses stack ranking to determine grades, rambles during class, useless, no valuable information learned from this class, highly encourage to take online if you can. He's a great guy but makes everything more difficult than it needs to be.

Professor is a cool person, but a horrible teacher. All the lecture is him talking , and a filling in the blank worksheet. His test are Ridiculous so bad that he even has to curve them. The learnsmart is a lot of work, but honestly save me from failing. Go to class because attendance matter. Project, grades it hard, and will insult your work.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Was an OK professor. Pros: tests are generally curved heavily, good sense of humour, approachable, drops lowest test score, noncumulative and optional final Cons: doesn't post grades until end, a bunch of handouts, very unclear with grading criteria and expectations on group project (and is incredibly harsh when grading them)

Kolenko was a cool professor. He connected a lot of his lectures to real life topics to make it easier to understand. However, tests were extremely hard. The only reason I passed was because he curved the tests to the max. Multiple tests, extra credit opportunities, and a group project at the end of the semester (no presentation).

One of the worst professors I have ever had between two universities. He grades so tough it is ridiculous to expect an A in this class (I have a 3.7 cumulative GPA). 3 Tests, One 40-Slide Group Project PPT that he takes off points for everything that he doesn't like, even if you follow the rubric. Very opinionated professor. DO NOT TAKE!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: College and school in general has been a joke most of my life, it's just there and I show up when I feel like it. Kolenko is the only teacher I have looked forward to seeing, even if it is an 8pm class. He is able to get the entire class involved BECAUSE YOU WILL WANT TO JOIN IN!! That's rare for me. He is a great teacher and highly recommended

Great teacher!! The one time I visited his office hours before so far he gave VERY USEFUL feedback. He is hilarious, and keeps the class vibe very light and fun and still productive. Handouts are great help. Very very veryyyyyy great classtimes. Good humor. Good real-life examples.

A typical liberal professor constantly bringing politics into every lecture. Honestly, it's terrible. He could be great if he kept his opinions to himself about Presidents. Lots of work in this class, reading and writing. Take someone else.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Really good prof, but not everyone's cup of tea. His tests are very hard. He gives fill in the blank notes every class and tests on them. You have to do work online on the book. I wouldn't take him again, but he was a great prof.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: In 3100 you will have a group project. Attendance sheet goes around every class. So either show up or find someone to cover for you.  Overall great class. Structured around his lectures and handouts that are fill in the blank to ensure you are paying attention. Exams are a mix of his handouts and the textbook so it is expected to read the material.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: In hindsight, this class was really awesome but arguably some of the most difficult tests I've ever taken. Be prepared to come to class EVERYDAY. Notes are lecture style that follow a million handouts. Lots of material. I learned a lot. Hilarious lectures but please study and pay attention. Loved his mustache. 10/10 would party w him on a yacht

Dr. Kolenko is by far my favorite professor at Kennesaw State! His exams are tough, but he does give you all the tools to succeed. I've taken him twice and would sign up to take him again! Very knowledgeable in what he teaches with lots of experience in the field.

Dr. Kolenko is one of a kind! He knows his stuff and wants to make sure by the end of this class you know yours, too! He uses real world material and handouts to teach. Use the handouts to study for the test, but you will also need to read, come to class, participate, and do all of the LearnSmarts or you won't have a chance. I would take him again!

I've taken Kolenko twice and I think he might be one of my favorite professors of my college career. I enjoyed his lectures and feel like I've learned a lot. he's a very entertaining guy to be around. He definitely values student feedback. Definitely recommend him.

Down to earth teacher. Relates material to real life. Learned a lot. Yes, his tests are challenging. Gives you handouts in class and you fill in the blanks as he lectures. Use handouts for study guides. Extremely nice teacher. Make sure he knows who you are by participating. He goes above and beyond to help students. Recommend

Don't take him unless you want to memorize everything word for word.  Asks you to buy a textbook that he never mentions in class.. but then there are questions on the test about the book. Stay away if possible.

Kolenko was one of the best professors I've ever had. He knows the material and passionate about teaching. He teaches in a way that keeps you interested and also very funny and relatable. He provides students with fill-in notes to follow along in each lecture and bases the exam around them. Study and the exams are easy. One group project. Take him!

One of the most rewarding classes that I have ever taken. He has real life experience and projects his love of teaching to the students that take him. You may not get an A, but if you actually put forth effort, you should definitely get a B. Plus you gotta love a guy that likes Harley Davidson!!

Very relevant and efficient professor. He has a strong personality that I found enjoyable. Covers the material using current examples from the business world. Tests can be challenging but he grades your score against the performance of the class. It is possible to make straight Cs on the tests and make an A in the class.

I  liked him as a professor overall. His lectures are lively and humorous. He uses several real world examples in them. However, the tests were tough, group project was a pain, and wasn't a fan of the handouts. You get too busy looking for what the next answer on the handout is going to be, that parts of the lecture can wind up lost on you.

Great teacher, not easy per say (to get an A effort is required). Lectures are great, gives handouts so you can listen, study for the tests and go to every class (he does student appreciation the last day and bought everyone pizza!). Wish he wasn't bound by the school to give a group project. You will learn a lot and uses real life examples. Great!

He CURVES the grade thats about it. Questions come from Handouts, learnsmart, book. But he asks the class where they want to be tested on. His tests are actually hard. You have to READ and MUG UP the handouts like literally to do good. I love his personality. He is humorous and liked by his students. His grading criteria is however a lil confusing.

If you have the opportunity to take Kolenko, I recommend it!! Great professor that really knows his stuff. The tests are a little tough but if you do the LearnSmart modules, although they're long, they really help. Project is tough also but he will review it for you. I'd take him again! And since he asked, here's your pepper Kolenko!

This class is a lot tougher than I thought it would be. The curve on the tests is huge, though. Not sure why he doesn't just modify the tests a little. He asked for a chili pepper, so here you go, Kolenko!
Tests are hard. You are unlikely to pass if you don't come to class. I thought his lectures were interesting. Also, hilarious!
I feel like I learned a lot and his lectures were interesting. We used LearnSmart in this class and it was a waste. Hopefully he isn't doing that anymore, but besides that his class was fairly easy.

He was a pretty cool prof. Class was interesting &wasn't boring &I feel like I learned a lot. I hated the tests. You have to read the book cover to cover to really pass them but he curves. The project was annoying and way too much work in my opinion, but its something that could probably look good for future jobs. I would probably take him again.

He is very enthusiastic about the subject but goes on long tangents throughout classes.  Gives out handouts, know EVERYTHING from the handouts and the book...I mean EVERYTHING.  Half of the questions on the exams start with "According to Dr. Kolenko..." and aren't relevant to management. Wouldn't recommend him for this class.
Amazing professor! Take Kolenko!!!

Dr. Kolenko is the best professor I have had in Coles College. He loves teaching and has a passion for management.  Tom is extremely helpful and wants you to jump up into the next tax bracket. Not for tax purposes, but because he wants his students to become successful individuals. Take him if you really want to learn about the real world!Love him!
Difficult class. requires you to go beyond just sitting in his class and reading powerpoint slides. funny and really helpful
Prof. Kolenko is very enthusiastic about what he teaches. But his tests are hard even when you study Textbook.Overall class is fun but you have to work hard.

Probably one of the hardest professors at KSU but i really enjoyed his teaching style. would definitely say take him but be prepared to put in work. Kolenko is in no way a breeze thru type of guy but very helpful and always available for help. MEMORIZE MEMORIZE MEMORIZE MEMORIZE  MEMORIZE MEMORIZE MEMORIZE MEMORIZE MEMORIZE MEMORIZE MEMORIZE

Great Teacher! he's really hard and all his tests consist of memorization only. If you're not good at memorizing and regurgitating then I would not recommend you take him. If you are, then you will ace the tests. It's 3 tests all out of 30 points (with some extra credit for the last two tests) and then 10% attendance. I would take him again.
His test are vary hard but he curves it. expect to study all the time if you chose to take him. Test are fill in the blank with no word bank.
Do not take him. His test are fill in the blank. Run

I took him for both 4170 and 4160 AWESOME professor. Tests are hard but very fair, grades on an extreme curve. Very Interesting, Really Cares about teaching. Wish he taught more classes. Go to class and fill in his handouts. Study and you will get an A there is no way not to. Offers extra credit but few people take him up on it.

Do not acknowledge to poor reviews. Kolenko prepares you for the ugly real world. He understands that scantron do not require in depth studying. Weak minded individuals will not like his class or his teaching style. In order to make an A, you must attend every class and pay close attention to details as well as study hard.  Awesome Professor.
Awesome class!! professor makes the sessions interesting, but prepare yourself for long study sessions before the exams! fill in the blanks exams are definitely not my favorite!

This class is amazing. Kolenko is extremely knowledgeable about real world business and how to succeed. Tests are 30 MC and are extremely hard! but he curves the tests and wants everyone to suceed. He even does a resume renovation on everyone's resume to help you get the highest paying job in business. TAKE THIS CLASS!
Hard class, great teacher.
He is funny and entertaining. Go to class and study for the test! Take him!
His tests are difficult, but overall I learned a lot in his class and he is very helpful. Truly passionate about teaching and helping his students succeed. One of the best classes I've taken.

This was by far the worst professor I've ever had! You don't know what your grade is throughout the course because his "grading scale" is sways changing! Their is WAY to much information given for only a 30 question fil in the blank test. If you are registered for his class DROP IT ASAP!!

Wow, Kolenko isn't all that bad. His tests are rather difficult, but if you study them, you will be fine. He grades on an extreme curve, so it depends on how well your class does. You need the book for vocab on the test. Just study as you go, it's not that serious!!

Great professor and helps explain when needed. Class is fast paced and interesting. His tests are hard!!!! I had a 4.0 until this class. I got a B in the class. Do not take if you want an easy ride, but you will learn a lot.

Notes are fill in the blank. Plan on memorizing 20+ pages for each test. Test are fill in the blank 30 questions. Have to know terms and read the book. Do not take if at all possible. Cool guy, keeps class interesting, but you will dedicate your life to passing this class, no joke.

HORRIBLE!! He is very into himself and his exams are 30 questions all written. We have been taught all through-out highschool and college on how to best take a multiple choice exam and this guy completely strays away from the norm. Studying is useless! I studied so hard felt pretty well and scored the lowest in the class. DO NOT TAKE HIM!
Go To Class!!! Notes are given as fill in the blank. The test are all fill in the blank. No word bank.1/3 of the test is from the book. Attendence is necessary

class is hard, prof is tough. he doesn't curve test that much. i think he stopped. try not to take if possible. there is 98% chance that you will re-take class with another prof so why waste your time in his class.

If you're looking for an easy teacher that doesn't require you to actually learn anything...this guys' class isn't for you. On the other hand, if you're looking for a teacher that will actually teach...this guy kicks A$$. He goes into great detail and gives plenty of real world exampls. His tests are intimidating, but he grades on an overall curve.

Great professor. Loves to talk and tell stories about his past-just tell him to "move it along". Gives handouts every class and thats all you do. Tests (3 total) are exactly from the handouts. Huge curve on tests. Lots of videos too, which are actually interesting. Really nice guy!

Awesome Prefessor! Great personality and makes the class interesting with jokes and sarcastic remarks. Very hard class though. Not including attendence there are 3 tests and that is your grade. Tests are very hard but not imposible. Just study hard and you will do fine. Grades on a curve so it really is a competition between classmates.
Very Hard Tests!!!
He's super cool, knows his stuff, and grades on a cool curve that helps with bad grades...  He's funny but he doesn't take any crap.  Good Teacher.

This class is enjoyable but tricky.  He gives difficult tests but always expects atleast half of the class to bomb it because he curves them so heavily.  Despite that I did well in his class.  The key is attendance (he counts it and it really is beneficial to you if he knows who you are) and the memorize the worksheets he hands out each class.

Great professor!  Tests are challenging but not hard.  Keeps you awake in class.  Tests are 30 questions, with most being fill in the blank.  He gives an outline of notes every class.  I wasn't going to take him because almost everyone said he was really "hard"...he's not if you put some effort in it.
This guy is great.  Helps you understand what he teaches and "whats going on in compensation"!

Just to clarify and respond to the cocky person just before me,I wrote a review previously and mentioned that Dr. Kolenko's test were difficult (along w/many others here)...THEY ARE.I too made As on all of his tests (after he had to curve them 30 points)!Don't let the person before fool you, the curve is weird and the tests are HARD-slacker or not!

second class I have had with this professor.  He is kinda tough, but how many easy courses do you want?  Suck it up and study and maybe actually learn something.  Just hope there isn't a curve busting book smart spoiler like me in there with you to make you look like the slacker you are. Those who complain about his tests just want a free ride

Weird class, too much material to cover in a semester.  His tests are ridiculous, has a lot of real world experience but does not seem to understand that most jobs are not union anymore.  If you cant help it do not take his classes, the aggravation from the tests are not worth it.

Big ego-VERY proud of his not teaching from the text and ridiculously hard fill-in-the-blank test.However, he still tests over undiscussed info in the book and he has to curve the test so much that you get the grade that you would have gotten had the test been at a normal difficulty level.He is ambiguous when helping.Class is fun but not worth it!
He makes you work and it's completely worth it - smart, engaging, great lectures and teaches from real world experience.  Great prof!
Tests are not easy, but the time flies in his class.  Lots of real world examples.  You will learn in his class, and if you attend and study, you will pass his tests.

His lectures are very interesting with a great deal of real world examples. Study the handouts, come to class, and at look over the chapters in the text. Dr. K. can be a bit course and tends to rub some people the wrong way. However he really cares about the success of his students.
One of the most instantly applicable classes I have taken in the program!  His tests are straight from the notes so attendance is a must.  Learn and memorize the details and you'll do fine!
